title: Death timer not showing correctly
body: Normally after an enemy is killed, the scoreboard shows the timer until they respawn, but on some occassions (not sure how to reproduce) instead of showing a timer, a question mark appears which can cause some confusion. This seems to be a local issue, as a team mate in the same match claimed they could see the death timer when I could not.

replies.body: Looking for a repro for this. The issue is super inconsistent so we really appreciate the help.
